text: Daniel Claiborne Hudson (born March 9, 1987 in Lynchburg, Virginia) is an American baseball player. He currently plays as a pitcher for the Pittsburgh Pirates of Major League Baseball (MLB). Hudson formerly played for the Chicago White Sox from 2009-2010 and was traded to the Diamondbacks on July 30, 2010 along with minor league pitcher David Holmberg for Edwin Jackson. ==References== ==Other websites== *Daniel Hudson at mlb.com Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:American baseball players Category:Sportspeople from Virginia Category:Arizona Diamondbacks players Category:Chicago White Sox players Category:People from Lynchburg, Virginia
title: Daniel Hudson (baseball)
